item.name: Cartoon
item.description: I modeled this cartoon-style map for testing a videogame with the Napalm 3D engine. This design is based on Crash Bandicoot first levels.

item.name: IMT
item.description: This is a level I modeled for the Immersive Mine Train game IMT. This game is developped for an immersive cave with a head tracking system.The player is in a wagon that follows tracks in a Mine, the aim is to avoid obstacles. I developped some scripts to export the IMT levels into 3Ds max, and then to position objects into the 3D scene. Then I developped other scripts to export back the 3Ds max scene to an IMT level.

item.name: NapalmPalace
item.description: To test the Napalm 3D engine, I modeled this building that required a lot of texturing work.
